name: Kine-Tech Animation Library
tagline: Animation Logic for Kerbal Space Program
body:
### About * The project is in it's infancy and is currently a side project for Lead Engineer Dustin Judson(@KineMorto), however the library will continue to grow and become more robust as more animations are needed and the Mod-Community for Kerbal Space Program as a whole makes requests and suggestions. * Originally started as a single class of Animation Logic for then Mod-Author [Bac9](http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/member.php/59469-bac9) and quickly and effortlessly developed into an extensive set of animation modules for various purposes through abstraction. ### Features * Numerous type of Animation Modules for Parts in Kerbal Space Program * Automatic generation of documentation for .cfg files via attributes. * DEBUG and RELEASE builds that expose relevant fields directly within the UIPartController. * Many more to come! ***

Kine-Tech Animation Library
Dustin "Kine" Judson
Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License.

Kine-Tech Animation Library is not affiliated with Squad in anyway. Kine-Tech Animation Library is a user modification designed for Kerbal Space Program. See below for relevant Squad legal information. *** Squad Legal:
